Package org.codehaus.cargo.ant

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CargoTask
    Ant task wrapper around the Cargo API to start/stop containers.
    ConfigurationElement
    Nested Ant element to wrap the DefaultConfigurationFactory class.
    DaemonElement
    Holds configuration data for the <daemon> tag used to configure the ANT tasks.
    DataSourceElement
    Holds configuration data for the <datasource> tag used to configure the ANT plugin.
    DeployableElement
    Nested Ant element to wrap a Deployable.
    Property
    Represent a container property.
    PropertySet
    Ant element used to tell the Cargo task to load a properties file containing system properties.
    RoleElement
    Holds configuration data for the <role> tag used to configure the ANT plugin
    UserElement
    Holds configuration data for the <user> tag used to configure the ANT plugin
    ZipURLInstallerElement
    Nested Ant element to wrap the ZipURLInstaller class.
